meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sizeable or substantial.
meanings.sent1: The sizinesses of the cake made it a perfect choice for the party.
meanings.sent2: The sizinesses of the elephant amazed the visitors at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The sizinesses of the suitcase made it impossible to fit in the tiny car.
meanings.sent4: The sizinesses of the mountain overshadowed the entire landscape.
meanings.sent5: The sizinesses of the library made it a paradise for book lovers.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a large or significant size.
meanings.sent1: Her room's sizinesses allowed for a comfortable study area.
meanings.sent2: The sizinesses of the ship made it stand out among the others in the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The sizinesses of the pumpkin surprised everyone at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The sizinesses of his dreams knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The sizinesses of the tree provided ample shade on hot days.

meanings.definition: The property of being sizable or spacious.
meanings.sent1: The sizinesses of the field made it perfect for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent2: The sizinesses of the house accommodated the large family comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The sizinesses of the closet allowed for easy organization of clothes.
meanings.sent4: The sizinesses of the park welcomed families for picnics and play.
meanings.sent5: The sizinesses of the beach provided endless opportunities for relaxation.
